t: How to Hide Your Orders on Amazon - Techlicious
s: If you need to find your order, click on 'Account & Lists' in the menu bar in the upper right and select 'Archived Orders.' You can choose to 'Unarchive Order' if you want to return your order to your regular order list. Amazon limits you to archiving 500 orders.

t: How to Hide Orders on Amazon
s: December 13, 2023 - Log in to Amazon on the web and click "Returns & Orders" in the top-right corner. This will show you a list of all the things you've ordered in the past three months. Scroll through the list until you find the order that you want to hide, and click "View Order Details."
